body:
Update of Eccodes to version 2.19.1

Confirmed working:
eccodes@2.19.1~aec+fortran~ipo+memfs+netcdf+openmp+png~pthreads~python build_type=RelWithDebInfo jp2k=openjpeg
with 
intel-parallel-studio@composer.2020.2~advisor~clck+daal~gdb~ilp64~inspector+ipp~itac+mkl~mpi~newdtags+rpath+shared+tbb~vtune auto_dispatch=none threads=none
title: Update of Eccodes to 2.19.1
